EmailTemplate.name: OP-202304-xSeg-SVB Transfer Notification.02a. Password Email [Reminder]
EmailTemplate.subject: [Reminder] Important Remittance Update - Access Information
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reference Number: {{member.Program Member Custom Field 2:default=edit me}} Dear {{company.Company Name:default=edit me}},
You should have already received an email informing you of our transition from Silicon Valley Bank to JPMorgan. In that email, we provided password protected links to our new bank details.
Please use the following password to access those links: 3r55m3
For more information, call Teladoc Billing Support at 888-260-4425 (Monday-Friday, 8:00am - 5:00pm CST), or email clientremitsupport@teladochealth.com <mailto:clientremitsupport@teladochealth.com> and cite the Reference Number provided at the top of this email. Please continue to send remittance information to payments@teladochealth.com <mailto:payments@teladochealth.com>.
Thank you in advance for your assistance with this transition. About Teladoc Health: Teladoc Health is transforming the healthcare experience and empowering people everywhere to live healthier lives. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages more than a decade of expertise and data-driven insights to meet the growing virtual care needs of consumers and healthcare professionals. All rights reserved. 2 Manhattanville Road, Purchase NY, 10577.
